itunes:title: Fake News 57 - Is The Country Shutting Down Again?
title: Fake News 57 - Is The Country Shutting Down Again?
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Dan Hollaway and Jessie Wiseman bring you the realest fake news of the week with several governors increasing social restrictions due to coronavirus case spikes in several states, a county in Oregon is exempting non-white people from wear...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Dan Hollaway and Jessie Wiseman bring you the realest fake news of the week with several governors increasing social restrictions due to coronavirus case spikes in several states, a county in Oregon is exempting non-white people from wearing masks, stimulus checks have been sent to dead people, a White model who identifies as Black slams White people for 'exploiting' the Black community, the New York prosecutor fired by Trump is now crying foul, a herd immunity music festival is suppose to take place in July, former CrossFit CEO Greg Glassman is now selling his shares in the company, and the Democratic National Convention will be virtual.

Ghostbed.com/DrinkinBros
